name: iCKB
description: iCKB is a decentralized application on Nervos Networkâ€™s CKB, enhancing the Nervos DAO by offering a liquid staking token. It allows users to convert CKB to iCKB, representing Nervos DAO deposits, enabling fast withdrawals without the standard 30-day lockup.
